_official_title: To assist in the conservation of rare felids and rare canids by supporting and providing financial resources for the conservation programs of nations within the range of rare felid and rare canid populations and projects of persons with demonstrated expertise in the conservation of rare felid and rare canid populations.
_short_title: Rare Cats and Canids Act of 2014

_official_title: To provide for the establishment of a global affairs strategy and assistance for people of African descent, and for other purposes.
_short_title: African Descent Act of 2014

_official_title: To require non-Federal prisons and detention facilities holding Federal prisoners under a contract with the Federal Government to make available to the public the same information pertaining to facility operations and to prisoners held in such facilities that Federal prisons and detention facilities are required to make available.
_short_title: Private Prison Information Act of 2014

_official_title: To amend title II of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a Federal "Grow Your Own Teacher" program, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Grow Your Own Teacher Act

_official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to eligible entities to train elementary and secondary school nurses on how to respond to a biological or chemical attack or an outbreak of pandemic influenza in a school building or on school grounds.
_short_title: School Protection Act of 2014

_official_title: To establish a grant program to provide States with funds to detect fraud, waste, and abuse in the State Medicaid programs under title XIX of the Social Security Act and to recover improper payments resulting from such fraud, waste, and abuse.
_short_title: Local Medicaid Enforcement Incentives Act of 2014

_official_title: To direct the Secretary of Labor to establish a competitive grant program for community colleges to train veterans for local jobs.
_short_title: REVAMP with Community Colleges Act of 2014

_official_title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to create protected credit reports for minors and protect the credit of minors, and for other purposes.
To ban hydraulic fracturing on land owned by the United States and leased to a third party, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Protect Our Public Lands Act

_official_title: To authorize the Attorney General to award grants to address the national epidemics of prescription opioid abuse and heroin use.
_short_title: Comprehensive Addiction and Recovery Act of 2014

_official_title: To amend the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to improve the ability of the United States to protect religious freedom globally through enhanced diplomacy, training, counterterrorism, and foreign assistance efforts, and through stronger and more timely and flexible political responses to religious freedom violations worldwide, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Frank R. Wolf International Religious Freedom Act of 2014

_official_title: To abolish civil asset forfeiture to the Federal Government.
_short_title: Fifth Amendment Restoration Act of 2014

_official_title: To enhance the early warning reporting requirements for motor vehicle manufacturers.
_short_title: Early Warning Reporting System Improvement Act of 2014

_official_title: To provide employees with 1 hour of paid sick leave for every 30 hours worked.
_short_title: Paid Sick Leave Act

_official_title: To exclude Social Security benefits from taxable income.
_short_title: You Earned It Act

_official_title: To designate Veterans Day as the Tuesday after the first Monday in November.
_short_title: Honoring Our Veterans By Exercising The Right To Vote On Veterans Day Act

_official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the $117,000 cap on income subject to Social Security payroll taxes.
_short_title: Scrap the Cap Act

_official_title: To expand Medicare coverage to eyeglasses, hearing aids, and dental care.
_short_title: Seniors Have Eyes, Ears, and Teeth Act

_official_title: To allow the importation, distribution, and sale of investigational drugs and devices intended for use by terminally ill patients who execute an informed consent document.
To require a report on procurement supply chain vulnerabilities within the Department of Defense.
To prohibit the United States Department of Homeland Security from purchasing, operating, or maintaining armed unmanned aerial vehicles.
_short_title: No Armed Drones for DHS Act

_official_title: To eliminate the incentive for corporations to continue to hold accumulated earnings offshore, to invest in domestic infrastructure, to provide for international tax reform, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Infrastructure and Global Tax Competitiveness Act of 2014

_official_title: To provide for a reduction in the amount that may be awarded to a unit of local government under subpart 1 of part E of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 3750 et seq.) for a unit of local government that funds an amount that is greater than 18 percent of its operating budget using revenue generated from collecting fines and other fees related to violations of traffic laws, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Build TRUST Act of 2014

_official_title: To impose sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation, to provide additional assistance to Ukraine, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Ukraine Freedom Support Act of 2014

_official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow small businesses to use pre-tax dollars for assistance to employees purchasing policies in the individual market and except certain health reimbursement arrangements from group health plan requirements, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Small Business Healthcare Relief Act of 2014

_official_title: To control the spread of aquatic invasive species between the Great Lakes basin and the Mississippi River basin, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Guarding Our Great Lakes Act

_official_title: To provide assistance to improve maternal and newborn health in developing countries, and for other purposes.
_short_title: Improvements in Global Maternal and Newborn Health Outcomes while Maximizing Successes Act

_official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to apply certain annuity benefits to Federal Protective Service law enforcement officers, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To protect Federal employees and visitors, improve the security of Federal facilities, authorize and modernize the Federal Protective Service, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To establish a grant program providing for the acquisition, operation, and maintenance of body-worn cameras for law enforcement officers.

_official_title: To require the Attorney General to issue rules pertaining to the collection and compilation of data on the use of deadly force by law enforcement officers.

_official_title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the Gibson Dam.
To provide for a study by the Transportation Research Board of the National Academies on the impact of diverting certain freight rail traffic to avoid urban areas, and for other purposes.
To make an interstate act to conceal a homicide a Federal offense.

_official_title: To prohibit the negotiation of trade agreements that include waivers of the "Buy American Act".
To tax capital gains at the same rate as ordinary income.

_official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an annual elective surcharge in lieu of estate tax, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for repealing the gas tax and establishing a carbon tax on highway fuels, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to increase criminal penalties for the sale or trade of prescription drugs knowingly caused to be adulterated or misbranded, to establish recall authority regarding drugs, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage retirement savings by modifying requirements with respect to employer-established IRAs, and for other purposes.
_short_title: SAVE Act of 2014

_official_title: To amend the FAA Modernization and Reform Act of 2012 to prohibit the flying of unmanned recreational aircraft near commercial airports.

_official_title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and title 5, United States Code, to require plans to establish policies addressing firm-specific risks in asset management services, greater diversification in investment strategies, and the inclusion of diverse asset managers and minority brokerage firms, and for other purposes.
_short_title: American Pension Investments Modernization Act of 2014

_official_title: To amend the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to further express United States foreign policy with respect to, and to strengthen United States advocacy on behalf of, freedom of religion or belief abroad and individuals persecuted in foreign countries on account of religion or belief, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To provide protection for children affected by the immigration laws of the United States, and for other purposes.
_short_title: HELP Separated Children Act

_official_title: To repeal a limitation in the Labor-Management Relations Act regarding requirements for labor organization membership as a condition of employment.

_official_title: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to the Congress a report on adoption disruption and dissolution in the United States.

_official_title: To make an Income Tax that is a flat 15 percent for all American citizens.
_short_title: Flat Tax Rate Act

_official_title: To lower the Federal tax on the earnings of American companies with foreign operations.
_short_title: Fair Tax for Repatriation Act

_official_title: To prohibit the replacement of the gasoline excise tax with a GPS, location or distance-based tax and for other purposes.

_official_title: To amend the Pribilof Islands Transition Act to require the Secretary of Commerce to provide notice of certification that no further corrective action is required at sites and operable units covered by the Pribilof Islands Environmental Restoration agreement, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To amend the African Elephant Conservation Act of 1988 to conserve elephants while appropriately regulating ivory in the United States.

_official_title: To repeal the provisions of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, which amended the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to establish separate contribution limits for contributions made to national parties to support Presidential nominating conventions, national party headquarters buildings, and recounts.
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 200 Westport Road in Kansas City, Missouri, as the "Nutterville Post Office Building".

_official_title: To conduct a study to ensure that enhanced communication is provided between commercial aircraft and air traffic control towers, and for other purposes.

_official_title: To protect cryptocurrencies.

_official_title: To restore the First Amendment Rights of Photographers.
